education_excellence: High school education excellence we are happy to connect with you in whatever way you are most comfortable
start_courses_description: Welcome to the beginning of the 2024 academic year at Collège international le pieux. We're excited to start our courses and begin a journey of learning, growth, and success together.

choose_section.heading: Why choose Collège international le pieux?

card1.title: Education Excellence
card1.description: We offer the best education to our students, ensuring they have access to a diverse range of learning resources and opportunities.

card2.title: We keep our students happy
card2.description: Our students are always happy because of the lectures with strong knowledge and experiences.

card3.title: Our Mission
card3.description: Collège international le pieux is committed to providing quality technical education, fostering innovation, and promoting entrepreneurship among its students.
